Text:
Thanks a lot for uploading the ROH mate.

Ive not seen thw TV show yet, but Ive been watching the PPVs all year. If anyone out there has heard of ROH but hasnt given it a try, ill say it is def worth your time.

I like TNA iMPACT and all, but I do prefer ROH. It cant really compare to WWE, since they are 'sports entertainment' (WWE has got much better in the last 3 months or so as well though) and really selling a different product. ROH is pro wrestling old school style.

And Jim Cornette is in it! :face lol
